## Patent Valuation Complete - US10958080B2

### Executive Summary
**Patent:** US10958080B2 - Method and Apparatus for Transmitting Wireless Power
**Assignee:** Samsung Electronics Co Ltd
**Valuation Method:** Income Method (Discounted Cash Flow)

### Valuation Results
- **Base Case:** $49.67 Million
- **Valuation Range:** $31.79M - $59.61M
- **Confidence Level:** Very High

### Key Findings
- **Patent Strength:** 86/100 (86th percentile) - EXCELLENT
- **Commercialization:** Fully commercialized (100% probability)
- **Market Position:** Active in $23.6B market growing to $165.15B by 2034 (24.6% CAGR)
- **Technology Maturity:** TRL 9 / CRL 9 - Full commercial deployment
- **Forward Citations:** 300 (exceptional industry impact)
- **Patent Family:** 6 jurisdictions
- **Remaining Life:** 16 years

### Financial Assumptions
- Discount Rate: 10.81% (WACC 4.81% + Risk Premium 6.0%)
- IP Contribution Factor: 32.61% (Feature Value Analysis)
- Profit Margin: 1.15% (Industry: Electronics - Consumer & Office)
- Projection Period: 10 years (2025-2034)

### Commercial Evidence
- Samsung Wireless Charger Pad Trio
- Samsung Wireless Charger Duo
- Samsung Wireless PowerShare
